thread.section_title: 42nd Street Photo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 42nd Street Photo | www.42photo.com
thread.title: Sally Thurston
thread.title_full: 42nd Street Photo reviewed by Sally Thurston

author: Sally Thurston
title: Sally Thurston
text: I searched many sites on the internet looking for the perfect lens for my Nikon D5, then found the best price at 42nd St. Photo. Not feeling secure that I had chosen my components correctly, I called to place my order with a real person, and that turned out to be the *amazing* Adam. He knew exactly what I wanted and gave me excellent advice... he even counselled me on weight of camera plus lens, and asked if I would be able to lift it easily enough to shoot with it? That's awesome service that shows a lot of care for the customer - I'll be back again and again!
